sentence: When House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy named the MAGA-friendly Reps. Jim Jordan and Jim Banks, two known bomb-throwers hostile to the committee, Pelosi exercised her veto power.
author: Eleanor Clift
title: The Jan. 6 Committee Members Are Patriots Making Sure Treason is Fully Documented

title: Jan. 6 committee has acquired 'voluminous' documents from Trump White House: Congresswoman
